## Videos by Sharon Machlis for fun things:

**What is this?**

Here is a list of video tutorials by Sharon for fun things to do with R that didn't fit in the other categories:

1.  [How to send Text Messages?](https://www.infoworld.com/article/3513359/how-to-send-text-messages-from-r.html)
2.  [How to Slack from R?](https://www.infoworld.com/article/3402657/how-to-slack-from-r.html)
3.  [How to send email from r and gmail?](https://www.infoworld.com/article/3398701/how-to-send-email-from-r-and-gmail.html)
4.  [Keep passwords and tokens secure with the keyring package](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q8Cilx-MOsU&list=PL7D2RMSmRO9JOvPC1gbA8Mc3azvSfm8Vv&index=44)
